tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MarketingReports (
   report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   report_date DATE,
   report_type VARCHAR(255),
   report_description TEXT,
   brand_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES BrandMetrics(brand_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
   campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   brand_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES BrandMetrics(brand_id)
);

CREATE TABLE brand_metrics (
    brand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_name VARCHAR,
    awareness_metric INT,
    reach_metric INT,
    engagement_metric INT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_data (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR,
    customer_location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_metrics (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_spend DECIMAL,
    reach_metric INT,
    engagement_metric INT
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_metrics (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    platform VARCHAR,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    likes INT,
    shares INT,
    comments INT
);

CREATE TABLE website_metrics (
    visit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    visitor_ip VARCHAR,
    visit_date TIMESTAMP,
    page_views INT,
    bounce_rate DECIMAL
);
